name: polar-url
description: URL parsing framework that's portable to Node 8, 10, etc.

scripts.test: RESULT="$(find . -name '**Test.js' -o -name '**TestN.js' -o -name '**TestNK.js' -not -path 'node_modules/*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'No tests'; else yarn run mocha; fi;
scripts.compile: RESULT="$(find -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tsc; fi;
